title: Field Service Technician (SF Bay Area)
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring groundbreaking professional 3D printers to the desktop of every designer, engineer, researcher, and artist in the world.
User satisfaction lies at the heart of Formlabs’ success. The capabilities of our technology are growing rapidly, and so are the needs of our team. We’re looking for:

Advanced problem solvers to figure out what went wrong and how to fix it
Empathetic communicators to keep our users’ trust
Capable tinkerers to get broken printers up and running on-site with our customers
Expert teachers to help our customers learn the ropes of 3D printing

Our incredible Customer Support Team connects with those users in a variety of different ways, through email, live chat, phone support, on-site service, and live trainings. As our product lines expand, our team is also expanding to include on-site service, training, and maintenance. Help us extend our world-class remote service offerings directly to our customers’ doorsteps.
If you’re looking to give the best-in-class on-site service for 3D printing professionals and enthusiasts around the world, we want you as a Field Service Technician. 
*note: this is a full-time remote position based around the SF Bay Area, though travel to northern CA and NV is expected. You must be located in the SF Bay Area to be considered for this role.
The Job:

Act as the first point of contact for current and potential customers. Answer questions and solve their technical issues effectively via phone, email, and live chat.
Be accountable for maintaining a good customer experience throughout remote and on-site engagements
Travel to customer sites to resolve issues, complete repairs, and perform maintenance on our products. Travel up to 100% of time (50% on average)
Deliver live product trainings and demonstrations
Work with other teams to rapidly and flexibly arrive at solutions for customers in very short time frames
Maintain accurate documentation relating to all on-site visits and repairs
Responsible for all customers within a certain region; some out-of-region travel
Print in 3D to your heart’s content

You:

Love to make your customer’s day by not only answering their question but also anticipating those to come
Embrace technology and can easily make friends with new technology
Enjoy working with your hands and with tools
Work well independently and under pressure. Handle stressful situations with tact and urgency. 
Communicate professionally and with grace with customers and fellow employees
Have a knack for problem-solving, getting to the bottom of things, and creating effective solutions
Able to embrace novel issues and are hungry to find solutions 
Excited about learning and always want to know more
Able to see the big picture but still notice the small details
Pride yourself on reliability, punctuality, and professionalism

Bonus Skills:

Previous experience providing field service for hardware products
Background or education in engineering, design, or the sciences
Background or education in electrical systems
Experience with 3D modeling, printing and digital fabrication

Our Perks:

Robust equity program to build future wealth through RSUs
Comprehensive healthcare coverage (Medical, Dental, Vision)
Low cost fund options in our 401K and access to advisors 
Generous paid Parental Leave (up to 16 weeks)
Tenure-based paid Sabbatical Leave (up to 6 weeks)
Flexible Out of Office Plan – Take time when you need it
Regular sponsored professional development opportunities
Many opt-in culture events across our diverse community
And of course… unlimited 3D prints

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. 
Even if you don't check every box, but see yourself contributing, please apply. Help us build an inclusive community that will change the face of 3D printing.
To all recruitment agencies: Formlabs does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Formlabs employees or any other company location. Formlabs is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes. Unsolicited resumes received will be considered our property and will be processed accordingly.
